Package CAMSv2

Class CampCommitteeMemberController

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.BaseController<Student,StudentView>
CAMSv2.StudentController
CAMSv2.CampCommitteeMemberController
public class CampCommitteeMemberController extends StudentController
The CampCommitteeMemberController class represents Controller for Camp Committee Member, managing their actions and interactions within the system.
Since:
13-11-2023

    • handleDisplayCampDetails

      protected void handleDisplayCampDetails()
      Displays the camp details using the associated view. Prints the camp information and list of attendees. Access is protected to allow subclasses to use this method.

    • enterGenerateAttendanceReport

      protected boolean enterGenerateAttendanceReport()
      Enters the process of generating an attendance report. Displays options to select the report filter and takes user input.
      Returns:
      Always returns true.

    • handleGenerateAttendanceReport

      protected boolean handleGenerateAttendanceReport(int choice)
      Handles the generation of an attendance report based on the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      choice - The user's choice for the report filter.
      Returns:
      True if the user wants to continue generating reports, false if they want to exit.
